item.title: Home Assistant
item.description: overview Home Assistant is essentially a home automation platform designed to be both accessible to users and powerful for enthusiasts. It is hosted on local hardware using software created by Nabu Casa (who also maintain ESPHome, a project I fully intend to utilize in the future). Home Assistant boasts a dedicated enterprise community that have developed a robust ecosystem of hardware and software compatible with Home Assistant right out of the box.
